system.description: The character toughens their mind against physical damage.
system.trigger: The character is attacked or otherwise in danger.
system.effect: The character's personal telekinetic field protects them. Any attacks against them that do 20 points of damage or less are instantly absorbed, and the protection continues. If an attack does more than 20 points of damage, it destroys the protection. Either way, the character remains unharmed.
